title: DKNY Jeans for Men - Premium Soft Slim Fit Mens Stretch Jeans
description: Premium Soft Stretch Fabric: Made with a blend of 65% cotton, 33% poly, and 2% spandex, these jeans are our softest slim fit denim yet. These stretch jeans for men offer a premium level of comfort that's unmatched by other jeans. They're perfect for all-day wear and move with you, providing exceptional comfort and flexibility for mens slim fit jeans.
Slim Fit: These slim-fit jeans sit comfortably below the waist and are slimmer through the seat and thigh. They offer a modern, tailored look that's perfect for any occasion.

14" Leg Opening: With a 14" leg opening, these slim-fit jeans sit comfortably below the waist and are slimmer through the seat and thigh. They offer a modern, tailored look that's perfect for any occasion.
Classic Styling: These DKNY jeans come with 5-pocket styling for a classic look that's always in style. Perfect for both casual and formal occasions.
Zipper Closure: These jeans feature a sturdy zipper closure that ensures a secure fit. The zipper is easy to use and durable enough to withstand daily wear and tear.
